headline: Martin Marietta Materials: Residential Recovery And Margin Expansion Drive Next Leg Of Growth
summary: Martin Marietta Materials is well-positioned for multi-year growth, driven by infrastructure, non-residential, and an anticipated residential recovery. See why I rate MLM stock a Buy.
